title: BSNL's home-grown 4G tech will be economical: K Rajaraman, DoT Secy - Economic Times
content: BSNL's home-grown 4G tech will be economical: K Rajaraman, DoT Secy  Economic Times
description: "The 4G technology would work, and is very critical for India from a security and economic perspective, because you will get to make in India and also you will ensure that there are no hidden backdoors which can be exploited later on," Rajaraman told ET.
